name: Blackout Sniper Shooter: Real Army Shooting War
name_original: Blackout Sniper Shooter: Real Army Shooting War
description:
War is on the horizon, enemies have started occupying bases and expanding their control over the lands, taking out much of the resistance in their path of destruction. You are the one and only resistance left, patrolling the airs on an apache helicopter.

Engage in a highly realistic and challenging air to ground sniper shooting experience on mobile devices. You play as an army sniper assassin on a mission to lay down heavy fire on the ground enemy forces, who have captured most of your army fortresses. Your job is to shoot down with maximum precision and retrieve the control of these bases back to your army.


SNIPER FPS CONTROLS DETAILED

Swipe the screen to move the aim while being suspended inside a moving aerial helicopter
Adjust zoom settings to focus in once the target is tagged
Hold down the breath button for that split second time frame for a steady and precise strike
Keep an eye out for your health status and enemy fire

GAMEPLAY
Unique sniper shooting experience in the air to ground fps shooter
Numerous levels to challenge your skills and clear out bases from enemy threats
Travel to the remote locations occupied by enemy forces like tundras, death island and desert fortress
Exquisite sniper shooting experience under tough battle conditions
Continuous update system to add more challenges and mission sets
